abstract: Frank Pizzurro of Brooklyn Denim talks about his product line and the new laser wash process.
snippet: Frank Pizzurro of Brooklyn Denim talks about his product line and the new laser wash process.
lead_paragraph: Four questions for Frank Pizzurro, the owner of the Brooklyn Denim Company in Williamsburg, which sells a wide-ranging selection of denim, along with hip supporting apparel and accessories.

headline.main: The Future of Denim, Long Term and Short
